meanings.sent1: I will eat whatever is on my plate.
meanings.sent2: She picked up whatever was left on the floor.
meanings.sent3: The cat will chase whatever moves.
meanings.sent4: The treasure hunters were excited to find whatever lay hidden in the cave.
meanings.sent5: The magician's hat produced whatever the audience requested.

meanings.sent1: I will help you whatever happens.
meanings.sent2: He will always love you whatever the circumstances.
meanings.sent3: Whatever the weather, we will have a picnic.
meanings.sent4: She will support you whatever the outcome.
meanings.sent5: The team will win whatever it takes.

meanings.definition: Used to express indifference or dismissal
meanings.sent1: Whatever, I don't care about that.
meanings.sent2: He said he would finish the project, but whatever.
meanings.sent3: Whatever, it's not a big deal.
meanings.sent4: She can go wherever she wants, but whatever.
meanings.sent5: Whatever, I'll just do it myself.
